title: Get the Amazon Fire TV Stick for Just $18 — Stream Netflix, Peacock, Paramount+ and More
description: Do you want to turn your TV into a smart TV? The Amazon Fire TV Stick can do just that — and it’s currently on sale for just $18. Here’s everything you need to know about claiming the deal. How Much Is an Amazon Fire TV Stick? The Amazon Fire TV Stick typically goes for […]
author: How to Stream Team
excerpt: Black Friday deals are rolling in early and the Amazon Fire TV Stick is currently available for 55% off — shop now.
text: Get the Amazon Fire TV Stick for Just $18 — Stream Netflix, Peacock, Paramount+ and MoreDo you want to turn your TV into a smart TV? The Amazon Fire TV Stick can do just that — and it’s currently on sale for just $18. Here’s everything you need to know about claiming the deal. How Much Is an Amazon Fire TV Stick? The Amazon Fire TV Stick typically goes for $39.99. Right now, however, you can snag it for 55% off. That means for just $17.99, you can majorly upgrade your entertainment system. Amazon Fire TV StickOn Sale 55% off What Is an Amazon Fire TV Stick? The Amazon Fire TV Stick offers endless entertainment in just one little gadget! Nowadays, TVs are practically useless little monitors. So if your TV isn’t a smart TV, you’ll need an attachment to bring all your streaming apps to your screen — including Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+, Peacock and more. You can also access live and free TV with an Amazon Fire Stick with subscriptions to Sling and Youtube TV, among others. Plus, even if you do have a Smart TV, an Amazon Fire TV Stick offers fast starts and easy navigation, likely offering smoother streaming and a better user experience than on your TV alone. How to Connect the Amazon Fire Stick to TV Amazon makes their streaming stick extremely easy to use. Here are step-by-step instructions for using the Amazon Fire TV Stick: Plug the device directly into your HDTV, or use the included HDMI extender. (Amazon recommends using the HDMI ARC port with Alexa Home Theater.) Plug into wall outlet. Connect to Internet and start streaming! Is the Amazon Fire TV Stick Worth It? The Amazon streaming stick has a 4.7 star rating on Amazon with over 452 thousand reviews. It’s one of Amazon’s most powerful streaming sticks — and at $17.99, it’s pretty much a no-brainer. Do You Pay Monthly for the Amazon Fire TV Stick? No! The streaming stick is simply an accessory for accessing your streaming subscriptions. With the stick, you will still have to pay for streamers like Netflix, Hulu, Prime Video and more in order to use them. Another perk? You’ll receive a six-month subscription to MGM+. (If you make a purchase through our links, TVLine may earn a commission.)
html:
Get the Amazon Fire TV Stick for Just $18 — Stream Netflix, Peacock, Paramount+ and More

Do you want to turn your TV into a smart TV? The Amazon Fire TV Stick can do just that — and it’s currently on sale for just $18. Here’s everything you need to know about claiming the deal.

How Much Is an Amazon Fire TV Stick?

The Amazon Fire TV Stick typically goes for $39.99. Right now, however, you can snag it for 55% off. That means for just $17.99, you can majorly upgrade your entertainment system.

Amazon Fire TV Stick

On Sale 55% off

What Is an Amazon Fire TV Stick?

The Amazon Fire TV Stick offers endless entertainment in just one little gadget! Nowadays, TVs are practically useless little monitors. So if your TV isn’t a smart TV, you’ll need an attachment to bring all your streaming apps to your screen — including Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+, Peacock and more. You can also access live and free TV with an Amazon Fire Stick with subscriptions to Sling and Youtube TV, among others. Plus, even if you do have a Smart TV, an Amazon Fire TV Stick offers fast starts and easy navigation, likely offering smoother streaming and a better user experience than on your TV alone.

How to Connect the Amazon Fire Stick to TV

Amazon makes their streaming stick extremely easy to use. Here are step-by-step instructions for using the Amazon Fire TV Stick:

  1. Plug the device directly into your HDTV, or use the included HDMI extender. (Amazon recommends using the HDMI ARC port with Alexa Home Theater.)
  2. Plug into wall outlet.
  3. Connect to Internet and start streaming!

Is the Amazon Fire TV Stick Worth It?

The Amazon streaming stick has a 4.7 star rating on Amazon with over 452 thousand reviews. It’s one of Amazon’s most powerful streaming sticks — and at $17.99, it’s pretty much a no-brainer.

Do You Pay Monthly for the Amazon Fire TV Stick?

No! The streaming stick is simply an accessory for accessing your streaming subscriptions. With the stick, you will still have to pay for streamers like Netflix, Hulu, Prime Video and more in order to use them. Another perk? You’ll receive a six-month subscription to MGM+.

(If you make a purchase through our links, TVLine may earn a commission.)
